hasAttributes.name: createdOn
hasAttributes.description: "Date and time when the record was created."

hasAttributes.name: createdBy
hasAttributes.description: "Shows who created the record."

hasAttributes.name: modifiedOn
hasAttributes.description: "Date and time when the record was modified."

hasAttributes.name: modifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: "Shows who last updated the record."

hasAttributes.name: customerId
hasAttributes.description: "Unique identifier of the contact."

hasAttributes.name: salutation
hasAttributes.description: "Type the salutation of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email messages, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: jobTitle
hasAttributes.description: "Type the job title of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: firstName
hasAttributes.description: "Type the contact's first name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: department
hasAttributes.description: "Type the department or business unit where the contact works in the parent company or business."

hasAttributes.name: nickName
hasAttributes.description: "Type the contact's nickname."

hasAttributes.name: middleName
hasAttributes.description: "Type the contact's middle name or initial to make sure the contact is addressed correctly."

hasAttributes.name: lastName
hasAttributes.description: "Type the contact's last name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: suffix
hasAttributes.description: "Type the suffix used in the contact's name, such as Jr. or Sr. to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: fullName
hasAttributes.description: "Combines and shows the contact's first and last names so that the full name can be displayed in views and reports."

hasAttributes.name: birthDate
hasAttributes.description: "Enter the contact's birthday for use in customer gift programs or other communications."

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: "Type additional information to describe the contact, such as an excerpt from the company's website."

hasAttributes.name: genderCode
hasAttributes.description: "Select the contact's gender to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns."

hasAttributes.name: EMailAddress1
hasAttributes.description: "Type the primary email address for the contact."

hasAttributes.name: EMailAddress2
hasAttributes.description: "Type the secondary email address for the contact."

hasAttributes.name: EMailAddress3
hasAttributes.description: "Type an alternate email address for the contact."

hasAttributes.name: mobilePhone
hasAttributes.description: "Type the mobile phone number for the contact."

hasAttributes.name: telephone1
hasAttributes.description: "Type the main phone number for this contact."

hasAttributes.name: telephone2
hasAttributes.description: "Type a second phone number for this contact."

hasAttributes.name: telephone3
hasAttributes.description: "Type a third phone number for this contact."

hasAttributes.name: fax
hasAttributes.description: "Type the fax number for the contact."

hasAttributes.name: address1Name
hasAttributes.description: "Type a descriptive name for the customer's address, such as Corporate Headquarters."

hasAttributes.name: address1PrimaryContactName
hasAttributes.description: "Type the name of the primary contact person for the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: address1Line1
hasAttributes.description: "Type the first line of the customer's address to help identify the location."

hasAttributes.name: address1Line2
hasAttributes.description: "Type the second line of the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: address1Line3
hasAttributes.description: "Type the third line of the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: address1City
hasAttributes.description: "Type the city for the customer's address to help identify the location."

hasAttributes.name: address1StateOrProvince
hasAttributes.description: "Type the state or province of the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: address1Country
hasAttributes.description: "Type the country or region for the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: address1PostalCode
hasAttributes.description: "Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the address."

hasAttributes.name: address1Fax
hasAttributes.description: "Type the fax number associated with the customer's address."

hasAttributes.name: company
hasAttributes.description: "Type the company phone of the contact."
